Data analysis in SMALÂ¶

We provide several examples of data analysis as IPython notebooks. These can be viewed and downloaded here.

The simplest form of the analysis is:

import MRS.api as mrs
G = mrs.GABA(file_name)
G.fit_gaba()

Once these lines are executed, the object G will now contain several attributes that quantify the relative abundance of GABA and creatine, which can then be used in further analysis.
